product_name: MSR Trail Lite Duo Coffee Press
long_description: The MSR Trail Lite Duo coffee press makes it easy to brew great-tasting coffee in the backcountry. Simply retrofit your existing pot lid for the Trail Lite Duo pot (sold separately) with the included Coffee Press Plug and you can go from cook pot to coffee pot in seconds. Wire mesh strainer and durable, food-grade gasket ensure a clean cup of coffee; gasket is BPA free. Plunger unscrews from the base for flat packing. Please note, this item includes only the coffee press, the MSR Trail Lite Duo pot is sold separately.
short_description: The MSR Trail Lite Duo coffee press makes it easy to brew great-tasting coffee in the backcountry.
